column4: can someone experienced with command-line please pm me so i can ask a few questions? :)

what is the best for text editing?
If you're going to code n stuff you should check up vi and emacs but they're a bit trickier
vi and emacs are really advanced editors with highly developed functions for programmers. They can be tricky to learn but fast and efficient once mastered
in order to compile lmme you probably need to install curses/ncurses and maybe dev packages
I suppose you have lynx already... If you need a bittorrent client that works without X I'd go for torrentflux if you plan to install mysql/php/apache that is
